text: kavurun allahvada, ohuge dutayinvada, (ættenma) visvasa karannoda, evænnanma tama deviyange sannidhanayehi siddikinvarun (satyavantayin) vasayen ha suhadavarun (parityagasilin) vasayen sitinu æta. (tavada) ovunta ovunge phalavipakada æta. ovunta (rju margaya dænum diya hæki) alokayada æta. kavurun (allahvada, ohuge dutayinvada) pratiksepa kara, apage ayavan boru karannoda, ovun niravasinya
